title: Open a pull request
description: TestLens starts monitoring your test runs as soon as you push a PR.

title: TestLens analyzes and reports flaky tests
description: As tests run, TestLens flags flaky or failing tests directly in your PR as comments — including controls to mute them.

title: Mute flaky tests
description: With a single click, you mute flaky tests and TestLens reruns the pipeline — right from the PR comment.

title: PR is green and ready to merge
description: With all flaky tests muted and tests passing, the PR is ready to merge!
